### Sitemap.xml Sample:
```xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" 
        xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <url>
    <loc>https://ztools.site/vi/</loc>
    <changefreq>weekly</changefreq>
    <priority>1.0</priority>
    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="vi-VN" href="https://ztools.site/vi/" />
    <xhtml:link rel="alternate" hreflang="en-US" href="https://ztools.site/en/" />
  </url>
  <!-- ... all tools for both languages ... -->
</urlset>
```

## ğŸ” WHAT'S IN EVERY PAGE NOW:

### Meta Tags (in `<head>`):
```html
<!-- Canonical -->
<link rel="canonical" href="https://ztools.site/vi/" />

<!-- Hreflang -->
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="vi" href="https://ztools.site/vi/" />
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://ztools.site/en/" />
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="x-default" href="https://ztools.site/vi/" />

<!-- Open Graph -->
<meta property="og:type" content="website" />
<meta property="og:url" content="https://ztools.site/vi/" />
<meta property="og:title" content="ZTools - Bá»™ CÃ´ng Cá»¥ Tiá»‡n Ãch Online Miá»…n PhÃ­" />
<meta property="og:description" content="..." />
<meta property="og:site_name" content="ZTools" />
<meta property="og:locale" content="vi_VN" />
<meta property="og:locale:alternate" content="en_US" />

<!-- Twitter Card -->
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image" />
<meta name="twitter:url" content="https://ztools.site/vi/" />
<meta name="twitter:title" content="..." />
<meta name="twitter:description" content="..." />

<!-- Author & Robots -->
<meta name="author" content="Anph" />
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow" />

<!-- Schema.org JSON-LD -->
<script type="application/ld+json">
[
  {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "WebSite",
    "name": "ZTools",
    ...
  },
  {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
    ...
  },
  {
    "@context": "https://schema.org",
    "@type": "WebApplication",
    ...
  }
]
</script>
```
